original_text: Although the Aramean army had come with only a few men, the Lord delivered into their hands a much larger army. Because Judah had forsaken the Lord, the God of their ancestors, judgment was executed on Joash.
korean_text: 아람 군대가 적은 무리로 왔으나 여호와께서 심히 큰 군대를 그들의 손에 넘기셨으니 이는 유다 사람들이 그들의 조상들의 하나님 여호와를 버렸음이라 이와 같이 아람 사람들이 요아스를 징벌하였더라

sentences.original_text: Although the Aramean army had come with only a few men
sentences.korean_translation: 아람 군대가 소수의 병사들만 왔음에도 불구하고

sentences.original_text: the Lord delivered into their hands
Because Judah had forsaken the Lord
